properties.Observatio: The anicut wall is built irregularly with  rubble stones, Existing Earthen canal, Water from this canal is used to grow paddy on an area of about 10 acres.
properties.Descriptio:
Construction of the Concrete Anicut

Scarifying existing rock surface to receive new concrete

Supplying and fixing M.S. dowels spliced and dovetailed with wedge at one end 16mm dia. And 600mm long, boring holes to 0.3m depth in fixing

Plywood form work
